testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #3
Your line "Enter what you want to convert (or exit): Conversion from ??? to foot is impossible" doesn't match with "Enter what you want to convert (or exit): Conversion from ??? to feet is impossible" in parts "foot" and "feet".
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter what you want to convert (or exit): > 1 kn to feet Conversion from ??? to foot is impossible Enter what you want to convert (or exit): > 3 grams to meters Conversion from gram to meter is impossible Enter what you want to convert (or exit): > exit
